attributes.action: Take over the two tower blocks in the former Chealsea barracks for use as london homes for MP,s
attributes.additional_details: The compulsory  purchase of the Tower blocks at the site of the former M O D site at chealsea baracks . redeveloped into self contained flats for MPs  thus ending the need for second homes in London  As this would be owned by the goverment and run as an hotel for Mp,s and staff  it would save the country millions .
